channel.title: Global Objects
channel.description:
Well, I've hit a roadblock. I have absolutely no idea how I would handle globalObjects on height levels. I've got it in the NewObjects() so that the objects I want on heightlevel 0 are inside of if(heightLevel == 0){ } , however that still doesn't work. It loads all the objects regardless of heightLevel. Does anyone have a globalObjects or ANYTHING that spawns objects that has height level? I would be willing to work around it.
[IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/iek0u9.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i26.tinypic.com/w22dj4.png[/img]
